q: calls her "dim'. Kay Burley hits the nail on the head when she says "Nobody cares what I think".( Apologies for shaky video and crappy sound!) give him the best chance to win an NFL title. "Absolutely, absolutely," Michael Vick said, when asked by NBC10 if Philadelphia was the best place for him to play football. I know we're only going to get better as a team. I would love to stay here, love to be here, and I think this team gives me the best chance of winning a Super Bowl. Michael Vick also admitted that Philadelphia wasn't at the top of his list of preferred destinations two years ago. "I didn't want to come here to be honest with you," Michael Vick

the powerful Lakers. Michael Jordan late flurry silenced the Staples Center and unceremoniously ended Los Angeles' run at a perfect postseason. "Anybody that bet on it, some broke people out there," Allen Iverson said. I'm glad nobody didn't bet their life on it'cause they definitely would be dead right now. Instead, the Sixers-- double-digit underdogs-- are very much alive as they again displayed their heroic heart. "Our guys just try hard," Sixers coach Larry Drew Brown said. "This is kind of unexpected

, with a first printing of 290,000 copies, was an immediate bestseller. Donald Rumsfeld is "controversial" and "polarizing" and "defiant," as ABC News described him. These are media jargon for we don't like the guy. But since ABC offered a good deal for publicizing his book and gained exclusive interview rights on broadcast TV, Donald Rumsfeld had to run the gauntlet there: ABC World News in the evening, Nightline later that night

. Zahi Hawass wrote, in a post to his Web site, which, due to the blocked Internet access at the time, he had to fax to colleagues in Italy to upload: My heart is broken and my blood is boiling. I feel that everything I have done in the last nine years has been destroyed in one day, but all the inspectors, young archaeologists, and administrators, are calling me from sites and museums all over Egypt to tell me that they will give their life to protect our antiquities. On Saturday, he wrote, "I was met outside by many Egyptians, who asked if the museum was safe and what they could do to help. The people were happy to see

invasion.' "Well, Mr. Barack Obama , if that happened," I replied, "I would come home immediately." The Barack Obama thought about that for a moment. Then he shook his head. No, Don Shula , you need to be here. I should have pressed the point harder.'... "Much of the 800-page book's dialogue is drawn from contemporaneous notes and memos that Donald Rumsfeld kept, many of which[ he'll post online].

article, " Justin Bieber Fans wait hours at David Letterman ( studios) for glimpse." During his interview with David Letterman , Justin Bieber made comments about the people outside. Justin Bieber was smiling and David Letterman responded that has never happened to me. David Letterman continued about how girls scream to Justin Bieber wherever he goes. Enjoy the videos to the left and please leave a comment for the girls that produced it.

comes from Silicon Alley Insider: "This is not a loss for Google," notes Jay Yarow. "Increasingly, it has seemed like Eric Schmidt was just an ambassador" for the company. Our read of the company is that Sergey Brin and Page have been driving most of the major strategic decisions for a while, says Yarow. So what brought the move about? It's probably "because Sergey Brin and Larry were frustrated with dealing with him. Note the quote from Eric Schmidt that Google wanted to` speed up decision making.
